title: PSA that Worked Ground might be the worst mechanic Riot has come up with.

replies.body: Been saying that since she got released. It feels like an afterthought. Like they designed her whole kit and started playtesting her, and thought...."hmmm shes not very interactive in lane so what if we throw in this worked ground idea"   Its completely pointless to her kit and serves no purpose except to put a chokehold on her ability to poke
